backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining types (Gender, Preference, UserProfile, Event, Message) and implementing golf social app backend with user profiles, course directory, events with RSVPs, messaging, sponsors, and access control using authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of Internet Identity authentication flow on the landing page Get Started button with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files including App.tsx, hooks, components, pages, and configuration files with descriptions of their functionality and features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Golf Social Dating App with root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with TanStack Router setup, authentication flow using Internet Identity, profile setup check, protected routes (map, courses, events, chat, sponsors), and theme provider with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Shared layout component with sticky header navigation featuring Lime Greens logo, active route highlighting with courseGreen background, navigation buttons for all main pages, logout functionality with query cache clearing, and branded footer.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form component with fields for handicap, gender, looking for, social preference, bio, and location coordinates, using shadcn/ui components and mutation hook to save caller user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for React applications, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend API calls including user profiles, matches, events, messages, course directory, and sponsors, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom golf-themed color palette (fairway green, sand tan, grass green) defined as CSS variables for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat interface component that displays a list of matches and allows real-time messaging with selected users, including message history and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/CourseBooking.tsx: Golf course booking interface with search and filter functionality (date, time slot, players, distance) for browsing and booking tee times at local courses.
frontend/src/pages/CourseDirectory.tsx: Displays a searchable and filterable directory of golf courses with location-based filtering (local/regional) and navigation to individual course details.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Manages golf events with creation, RSVP, and cancellation functionality, displaying upcoming and past events with attendee counts and timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Hero landing page with authentication buttons, featuring gradient background, logo, and four feature cards highlighting the app's core functionality (matching, courses, events, community).
frontend/src/pages/MapView.tsx: Displays nearby golfer matches with distance calculation and filtering by handicap range, maximum distance, and preference type, showing profile cards with location data.
frontend/src/pages/SponsorsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of sponsor cards with categories (Equipment, Apparel, Services), descriptions, and external website links.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a golf-themed design system with custom colors (fairway green, sand tan, etc.), OKLCH color space, extended theme tokens for UI components, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a golf social dating app with features including location-based matching, course booking integration, event hosting, chat system, and known issues with post-login navigation and Get Started button functionality.
